title: Messages
description: Each workflow has one or more than one step. Each step is either a channel (inapp, email, push, chat) or an action (digest, delay). Within the workflow, every channel has a separate template. Email channel step content can be different than inapp channel step content. When a workflow is triggered, Novu generates separate messages for every channel step and sends that message to the recipient. A triggered event (notification) is a collection of step information, its message, and job execution details.
